unsolved: Handing over user sessions from a user's device to another (this has been solved nowadays, but the paper is from 2009)
use_cases_desc: Any kind of scenario that requires hand over of user sessions.
contribution_desc: The paper describes a concept that allows users hand over a task started on one device (i.e., computer) to a second device (i.e., mobile phone) by scanning a QR code with the second device. The server manages the session hand over, so the (application-)state is maintained after the handover. The author also describes a proof-of-concept implementation (i.e., copy&paste application) and compares this approach to typing the URL by hand.
toolkits: Link to project in the paper, but following the URL results in 404 error
